trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can be set to a value within a range.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以設定為值的範圍內的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Controls may allow recalibration of their supported properties based upon locale or user preference.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可讓重新校準支援根據地區設定或使用者的喜好設定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An example of this would be a thermometer control that can be set to display the temperature in Fahrenheit or Celsius.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是溫度計控制項可以設定來顯示華氏或攝氏溫度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個快取的屬性值<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 快取的屬性值必須已先前曾要求使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: To get the value of a property at the current point in time, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得在目前點的屬性值的時間，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.Current%2A>取得屬性

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The cached property values.
trans-unit.target: 快取的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 要求的屬性不在快取中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的屬性值，這個<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: 此模式必須從<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>與<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>參考，以取得目前的值。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>使用取得<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>、 它只快取資料，包含，並嘗試取得任何屬性的目前值引發例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.Cached%2A>取得的快取的值屬性，先前已使用指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The current property values.
trans-unit.target: 目前的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange*> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Maximum*> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Maximum*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Maximum*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Minimum*> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Minimum*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Minimum*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern"></xref>控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 模式識別項會傳遞至方法，例如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>擷取控制項模式，從指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>感興趣的</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 設定與相關聯的值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目。

trans-unit.source: The actual value set depends on the control implementation.
trans-unit.target: 設定的實際值取決於控制項的實作。

trans-unit.source: The control might round the requested `value` up or down.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可能會捨入所要求`value`啟動或關閉。

trans-unit.source: A UI Automation client can examine the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value%2A> property to determine the actual updated value.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化用戶端可以檢查<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value%2A>屬性來判斷實際更新的值。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The client can also register for a property-changed event on the property and examine the old and new values returned in the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPropertyChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端也可以在屬性變更事件的屬性上註冊，並檢查傳回<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPropertyChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPropertyChangedEventArgs>的舊的和新值

trans-unit.source: The new value of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的新值。

trans-unit.source: value is less than the minimum or greater than the maximum value of the element.
trans-unit.target: value小於最小值或大於最大值的項目。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange*> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value*>

trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>同等的欄位
